content: So far I really like it It would be nice if the autosave feature happened frequently. I don't usually find games that I will play for long durations. I have been with this game. There is a small little tutorial book included in the game but much of it is exploration and figuring things out yourself. Save often and maybe even have a couple of save files. Im still playing it and that says a lot!

Fun and challenging survival, crafting, and farming game. More difficult than Stardew Valley, which is a good thing. I'm happy that there's an option to save your game at any time, not just after you sleep. Definitely worth the price.

It's a post apocalyptic Stardew Valley. If SF was too cutesy for you, try this. Lots of exploration and the game is nicely balanced, not too easy, not too hard. Good ambient soundtrack. Will keep you entertained for many hours. Also on Steam so if you're unsure check the reviews on there.
Love this game like crazy its very real but pretty much relaxing but hopefully the game will be updated with new content and maybe a few enemies will be nice but it's still a really fun game
The water and mood bars go down to quick and u don't have time for exploration of the environment to gather material to upgrade
replyContent: Hello, thank you for your feedbacks, try to keep your toxicity as low as possible, the more you have toxicity the more your stats will fall down

content: Green project is a great game.I spent long hours on this game.I'm quite addicted playing this and I love it.I know the devs have constantly improving this game pc and mobile to bring us more new contents, elements,depth and challenges to the game.I know it will be more and more better through constant updates to the game.I love this game, just keep adding more content in this game and I hope the game will expand and be supported by the developers till the end :D

Been wanting a game like this! Absolutely loving it. Basicly spent the last 24 hours straight playing to the point my phone died while charging. Hope I didnt lose too much progress but I'll be getting right back into it ;)
I really like this game. I have it on tablet and pc. There are two reason for 4 stars not 5. I would like to see tap to move and the food goes bad to quickly. Thanks for great game.
I Absolutely love the game. Highly recommended if you're tired of regular a** games. This one is perfect for killing time.
Great game so what's next wolves and winter ;).
Wow

Looks fun but please let us tap to move? The controls are horrible with the virtual pad and I just cannot play the game, too frustrating. Volume controls and a quit button would be great too. October 2020 - Kind of disappointed that there is still no alternative movement, such as tap to move.

Good game, needs a lot of improvement, better controls(maybe a remote compatibility), a game pause setting/option. Map is small maybe with more updates more storyline?. Other than that good survival game .

This game is really fun and a time killer if you don't have anything to do I would really give it a try it's a challenge but still fun!

A really good game. Small learning curve, but just hang in their - it gets good, real good. Start planting saplings ASAP. I found it a little tricky at first... put down fertilizer, then use hoe, then plant sapling. That's it no watering, just watch it grow. My only issue is it could do with an easier way to close inventory screens. Question to the Dev, is there a way I could set up the save game location in a cloud, to share the save between android and steam. Got both copies, it's that good.
Pretty good game, can't wait for more content.
Buttons at corner of screen on Android phone is unresponsive, especially the close (x) button of the inventory. Is it possible to add another close button somewhere nearer to the center of screen?
Needs more gamemodes. And they have to make your hunger thirst & sleep bar to stay at 99.
No tutorial to get started. No idea how to explore or harvest resources etc. No explanations of anything. I would like a full refund.
Good game has alot of potential but for some reason my game would restart every 2 days. Not sure if it's my system, Since I don't see anyone else reporting this isaue.
Nice concept... I love it... A lot of potential
Installed for about an hour, no tutorial, lots of bugs with items vanishing, saved games vanish. Refund isn't allowed. I would not recommend purchasing.

Love the update so far ... But I think you need to add split half item and auto sorting function on backpack It's hard to split item you need to drop one by one and pick up again T.T I still love the update so keep up the good work

FANTASTIC GAME, Beyond what you expect. At times it can feel lonely but its an amazing Survival focused on the Survival aspect of the game, no combat needed
Love this game :v I hope this game updates and catch up with the pc ver ASAP :3
Love this game.
Amazing game can't wait for the next update just having a little lag issue with the amount of trees I have grown otherwise a full 5 star to this game

I hope this comes to xbox and playstation one day this game is a great way to relax like stardew and has a lot of potential
The game is a lot of fun. Reached end game rather quickly though and hoping more content comes out on game updates following the steam version.

need some improvement. Tap and drag is not a good method to walk. And to move object between inventories. Tap to pick and tap to put down is a lot better. EDIT: (add one star, my review was 4 stars) After playing for one day. The control isn't very annoying anymore. It just need some time to get used to.
Great game

This game has a lot of potential. It's a fun survival game that you have to beat the bushes from scratch in order to survive. But I saw lots of things that they need to add and changes to make on the game. I hope for the next update they could add settings to change position if the movement button to their desired position. And I've noticed that I cannot put coffee to seed machine to make seeds. And the chamomile tea gives (-)50 sleep instead of (+)50 sleep. Please hear me out devs! thanks!

Before the update I had lost 2 save files where I had started to have a decent green factor and all of a sudden next time I loaded my save was gone. But now thanks to the latest update this has not happened anymore. So 5 stars for these All Stars.

Good so fare... but.... one issue I have is the radius for my walking. I will cut way before the green bubbles and still take damage. The other issue is that I cant seem to plant or seed the coffee beans and even after talking to some people about it, it seems after the last update you should be able to but, if it's not then that means it's a bug that needs to be fixed. Just wanting to play without lack of sleep being a problem all the time

Haven't played that long, but I had some thoughts on the game and 500 characters just aren't enough, so I put my full rewiev in the edit history. If you are a fan of stardew valley and (post apocalyptic) survival games, it's definitely worth a try.

Overall it is a remarkable survivor game, have many things to do and the more you play the more you know, but I have suggestion, can you make it support gamepad, I have a gamepad but it's just support the movement button, anyway thanks for the great game..
Game start is good. More map require because after explore all the area, i got nothing to do..

I unfortunately lost my axe I had gotten so far... 44 trees I got my second animal everything was good until I looked and looked in my inventory no axe... unless they add a recipe where u can craft one I can't play I refuse to start over I got too far :(

You need a woodsaw to make a woodsaw... and within minutes of starting my game my woodsaw dissapeared... didn't really feel like continuing. Several layers of polish are needed to make this game something ill come back to.
Sometimes stuff disappear when you put them on your workbench or Bucket ,My sprinkler was gone like that!
Maybe it's will be good if the control can be improve, well I hope it can be better and update regularly but it's still good game and thanks for publishing it on Google play
Definitely enjoyed this one, but the current update made the movement control a bit unresponsive. Either way, I had a good time playing it.
Saw the game on YouTube and was excited to play it on mobile. But its currently unplayable buggy walking and items vanish when dropped... when fixed would love to re buy and try the game out.
Good game. Spent a few hours on the PC version. Realised it's on mobile so purchased here too !

Needs to rain more often also the ability to move generated chest and storage and vehicles would be nice but water big issue for me rained once at the beginning then after like 10-12 days with out water my crops died and I died even tho some stuff like the logs in the cars was an annoyance I give 5 stars good game just please tweak the rain.
I'm waiting for the update that are available in Steam. Please I really like this game!!

Overall game is awesome, it takes a while before you can get use to it. But two star is for the gruesome controls. Character died because I could not get the food on the table as selection goes to the cauldron or the kitchen table and cannot get cooked food or water in between. Spacing on doors are also an issue. Sometimes you can't get the room because there is an invisible thing blocking the doorway.

The game is really fun. I would like it if you guys put multiplayer and play with friends or online with other people. I love this game.
Great game, I really love this game, thanks dev keep it up.

Enjoying it so far.. Sort of a post-apocalyptic stardew valley. No ads (paid for, on sale) or in-app purchases that I've seen. But, it really really needs some kind tutorial or online resource. Update: been playing a LOT and figured a lot out. Could still use the tutorial stuff, but 30+ in-game days in and still a lot to do.
replyContent:
Hello, I'm glad that you like the game! :) 
I understand what you mean, and I approve it, the PC version will be out on steam in about on week and it will have online resources. Thank you for your constructive opinion.

content: I love pixel art games. I love survival/crafting games. The farming aspect is fun and new to me. Games is slightly on the difficult side at the start which got me more engaged. You can Litteraly starve and/or dehydrate yourself to death by sleeping. Sleeping significantly decreases thirst and hunger meter which adds to the difficulty. Eat before bed not to die, then eat when you get up not to die. 2x resource cost for sleeping be prepared! Thanks for making the game! Its fun!
